data.title: Nonprofit offers free internet to SNAP recipients amid government shutdown halting benefits on Nov 1.
data.description: In Hoboken, New Jersey, on October 30, 2025, a national nonprofit organization called Computers 4 People is stepping in as the government shutdown jeopardizes SNAP benefits for millions. With the potential suspension of food stamp benefits on November 1 looming, this organization is initiating an emergency relief campaign to address the issue. Computers 4 People is focused on bridging the digital divide and is utilizing its internet service to provide crucial support during this challenging time.

data.title: Newmark secures $600M financing for 8 multifamily properties in Southeast/Midwest. Commercial real estate leader.
data.description: On October 30, 2025, Newmark Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: NMRK), a prominent commercial real estate advisor, disclosed that it has facilitated a significant transaction. The company caters to major institutional investors, global corporations, and property owners.

data.title: AI's rapid advancement triggers concerns of demonic possession as it's debated by religious & tech experts due to rising popularity.
data.description: Concerns about the spiritual implications of artificial intelligence are being discussed by religious leaders and tech experts as the use of AI becomes increasingly common.

data.title: Network Media Group 2025 Q3 results: Revenue $2.85M, net income $135,853, backlog $4.8M, earnings per share $0.01, and Adjusted EBITDA $237,790.
data.description: Network Media Group Inc. reported financial results for Q3 2025, with revenues of $2,849,848, net income of $135,853, and Adjusted EBITDA of $237,790. The company also disclosed a backlog of $4.8M. Earnings per share were $0.01, and Adjusted EBITDA earnings per share were also $0.01. Network President Curtis White highlighted the return to profitability and success of their documentary slate. For the nine months ended Q3 2025, revenues were $5,366,881, net loss was $342,647, and Adjusted EBITDA was $200,314. Key operational highlights included recognition for Sly Lives! including Emmy and Critics Choice nominations. The full article can be accessed on Benzinga.com.

data.title: Guardian Capital Group gets court approval for acquisition, with shares to be bought at C$68 each by Desjardins Group.
data.description: In Toronto on October 28, 2025, Guardian Capital Group Limited ("Guardian") (TSX: GCG) (TSX: GCG.A) has successfully received a final order from the Ontario Superior Court of Justice (Commercial List) for the approved plan of arrangement under the Business Corporations Act (Ontario). This arrangement involves Desjardins Global Asset Management Inc. (the "Purchaser"), a Desjardins Group affiliate, acquiring all outstanding Common shares and Class A shares of Guardian for C$68.00 per Share in cash. The acquisition excludes certain Shares held by specified Shareholders with equity rollover agreements.

data.title: Dow hits record high, Nvidia surges, Microsoft reaches rare milestone. Stock market coverage by Investor's Business Daily.
data.description: On Tuesday, the Dow Jones and other key stock indexes reached all-time highs. Microsoft achieved a significant milestone, placing it in an exclusive group of companies. The Dow closed at a record high, with Nvidia experiencing a surge in its stock value. This news was covered live by Investor's Business Daily.

data.title: Markets anticipate Fed rate cut to 3.75%â€“4.00% range. 98% chance of third cut in Dec. Powell's words post-cut hold key.
data.description: Wall Street is anticipating a 25 basis points interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve, with a 98% probability of a third cut in December. The Federal Open Market Committee is expected to lower the federal funds rate to a 3.75%-4.00% range due to slowing labor markets and normalizing inflation. The possibility of more rate cuts and hints from Fed Chair Jerome Powell will be closely watched by the market. According to economist David Mericle from Goldman Sachs, the trajectory of rate cuts seems steady with a baseline of three cuts this year as per the September dot plot projections. The market is eagerly awaiting Powell's statements for clues on future rate cuts and potential market impact.

data.title: Gold and silver miners face a 20% drop after an explosive rally in 2025. VanEck Gold Miners ETF (NYSE: GDX) and Newmont Corp (NYSE: NEM) dropped 16% and 20% respectively. Global X Silver Miners ETF (NYSE: SIL) fell nearly 20%. Spot gold fell from $4,380 to below $4,000, and silver collapsed from $54.45 to $47. Wall Street analysts still bullish with Bank of America predicting gold to hit $5,000 in 2026.
data.description: After a strong rally in 2025, gold and silver miners are now experiencing a significant pullback, leading to concerns among traders and investors about whether this is a healthy correction or the end of the upward trend. The VanEck Gold Miners ETF surged 147% year-to-date but has since dropped by 16%, while Newmont Corp., the world's largest gold miner, saw a similar pattern with a 158% increase now followed by a 20% decline from its peak. The Global X Silver Miners ETF also dropped nearly 20% after a 150% surge in the same period. Additionally, spot gold fell from an all-time high of $4,380 to below $4,000, and silver dropped from $54.45 to $47 in less than 10 sessions, erasing previous gains. Despite this, Wall Street analysts like Michael Widmer from Bank of America still believe in gold's long-term potential, predicting it could hit $5,000 in 2026 due to favorable macroeconomic conditions. The current drop is seen by analysts as a "classic" correction after being overbought, but it does not change the overall bullish outlook for gold.

data.title: International Battery Metals adds $2.0 million investment from EV Metals under existing LOI.
data.description: In Vancouver, British Columbia, and Plano, Texas, International Battery Metals Ltd. (IBAT) (TSXV: IBAT) & (OTCQB: IBATF), a provider of modular direct lithium extraction systems, has completed a non-brokered private placement financing. This marks the second follow-on investment under the binding Letter of Intent (LOI) with EV Metals 7 LLC from March 2025. The company secured this funding as part of its ongoing partnership with EV Metals.

data.title: Uber has launched in Barbados, offering travelers a convenient transportation option on the island. This is Uber's first venture into the Eastern Caribbean region.
data.description: Barbados, on October 30, 2025 - In a recent development, tourists in Barbados now have the convenience of utilizing the Uber app to navigate the island effortlessly. This launch signifies Uber's entry into the Eastern Caribbean region, providing easy access for visitors to request transportation with just a few taps on their smartphones. This marks a significant milestone as Uber expands its services to a new market, offering increased accessibility to explore Barbados.

data.title: Black Diamond Group reported $105.3 million in total revenue for Q3 2025, showing a 4% increase compared to the same period in 2024. Key highlights include a 10% rise in Adjusted EBITDA to $31.8 million and a 65% boost in profit to $12.2 million. The company also increased its dividend to $0.045 per quarter, payable on January 15, 2026. Operating in Canada, the US, and Australia, Black Diamond foresees ongoing stability and growth opportunities.
data.description: Black Diamond Group Limited, a provider of space rental and workforce accommodation solutions, reported its financial results for the three and nine months ended September30, 2025. Total revenue for the quarter was $105.3 million, with a profit of $12.2 million, a 65% increase from the previous year. Consolidated rental revenue rose by 9% to $41.3 million, and the company's contracted future rental revenue stood at $159.0 million. Adjusted EBITDA for the quarter was $31.8 million, up 10%. The Company's net debt decreased by 12% to $197.1 million at the end of the quarter. Capital expenditures were $19.6 million, including maintenance capital of $2.9 million. The Company announced an acquisition and dividend increase, with expectations of sustained growth. Black Diamond continues to focus on expanding its rental platforms in North America and Australia, aiming for continued organic and inorganic growth opportunities.

data.title: Mobix Labs granted 180-day extension by Nasdaq to regain compliance with minimum bid price requirement.
data.description: In Irvine, California on October 30, 2025, Mobix Labs, Inc. (Nasdaq: MOBX) revealed it secured a 180-day extension from the Nasdaq Stock Market to meet the minimum bid price requirement per Nasdaq Listing Rule 5550(a)(2). The company specializes in advanced wireless and wired connectivity, RF, switching, and filtering technologies for upcoming communication systems. This extension provides additional time for Mobix Labs to fulfill the compliance standards.

data.title: City Ventures' Towns on First in Downtown Upland almost sold out with final homes release this weekend, reflecting high demand.
data.description: In Upland, California, Towns on First, a townhome-style community by City Ventures, is experiencing rapid home sales. As California's top builder of eco-friendly homes with solar panels included, City Ventures revealed that the last phase of homes at Towns on First will be available this Saturday, November 1. The high demand from buyers looking to reside in the walkable Downtown Upland area is evident in the quick sales. Reflecting the shift in buyer preferences, modern homebuyers seek more than just a house, seeking eco-conscious and sustainable features.

data.title: Polygraf AI secures $9.5M funding led by Allegis Capital for scaling secure AI solutions. Expanding products and markets.
data.description: An Austin-based company, Polygraf AI, recently concluded a seed funding round amounting to $9.5 million. Allegis Capital led the investment, with participation from Alumni Ventures, DataPower VC, and Domino Ventures alongside existing investors. The primary objective behind this funding is to expedite their objective of enhancing transparency and reliability in enterprise AI. The fresh capital injection will be utilized for expanding products, furthering research and development activities, and bolstering market penetration particularly targeting the enterprise, defense, and intelligence segments. The financial backing received by Polygraf AI marks a significant development in their journey.

data.title: Mid-Southern Bancorp, Inc. sets dissolution payment range at $17.45-$17.75 per share; record date is Nov 10, distribution by Nov 14.
data.description: In Salem, Indiana, a financial announcement was made by Mid-Southern Bancorp, Inc. on Oct. 28, 2025. The company (OTC Pink: MSVB), formerly the parent of Mid-Southern Savings Bank, FSB, revealed that shareholders are anticipated to receive approximately $17.45 to $17.75 in cash per share of common stock held, calculated based on the Company's financial status as of September 30, 2025. This per share consideration is set to be distributed to shareholders listed on record by November 10, 2025. Following this date, the Company's common stock will be delisted from the OTC Pink Marketplace, ceasing stock trading activity. The Company expects the dissolution distribution to be completed around November 14, 2025; the exact delisting date will not be confirmed by the Company, and no notification will be provided upon implementation.

data.title: MediciNova's study shows tipelukast has influence on cholesterol metabolism in patients, published in Journal of Atherosclerosis and Thrombosis.
data.description: A recent study featured in the Journal of Atherosclerosis and Thrombosis has shown that tipelukast (MN-001) and its metabolite MN-002 impact cholesterol metabolism in patients. This research sheds light on the effects of these compounds on cholesterol regulation. The findings of this study provide valuable insights into the potential role of tipelukast in managing cholesterol levels. This study is significant as it addresses the influence of tipelukast on cholesterol metabolism, highlighting its potential as a therapeutic option. This study adds to the growing body of evidence supporting the use of tipelukast in patients with dyslipidemia.

data.title: Micron adjusts investor event time from 7:20 a.m. to 6:00 a.m. Mountain Time.
data.description: On October 30, 2025, Micron Technology, Inc. (Nasdaq: MU) announced a change in the time of their upcoming conference. Originally scheduled for 7:20 a.m. Mountain Time, the conference will now take place at 6:00 a.m. Mountain Time.
